title: Hey guys....
body:
If anyone knows about ppl harrassing me in game and not receiving punishments from Riot please contact me via ingame. You can add me and tell me about it. Ty. Riot thinks it's cool to have people do this with impunity atm, so I need some ppl who know others to say what they know on my behalf.  Names need not be given. I'll give you a seperate anonymous contact. 

Thx.

replies.body: Or you could just use the report function, if you feel that doesn't work take screenshots and send a support ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=W2yEeN7L,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-10T16:52:13.927+0000)
>
> Or you could just use the report function, if you feel that doesn't work take screenshots and send a support ticket.

That doesn't even make sense. Did you read the op? Riot permabanned me but let all these ppl off. I need someone to give a statement to prove Riot's wrongdoing toward me, because they [Riot] certainly 'ain't' admitting it.

And that'll do what?

You don't own your account, you basically rent it from Riot until they say no on your lease.

You wouldn't have been permabanned for nothing, you did something wrong and got punished for it.
Let me know if you are reporting for cyber bullying. Be interested to know how it pans out.

One of the only posts that's negative/-4

;)

I am not interested in the identity of anyone, but just need a "witness" statement as it will help deal with this company. You want to nail this for all the wrongs you perceive you can help do it.  I'm willing to talk to ex employees of Riot.

Actually they just permabanned me so you guys who are doing it are free to gloat about it. Actually it looks like I can log in.......but can't get to friends list without clicking the I understand box, which I wont at the moment.
